title: LF One Tier 2-3 Top/Adc/Support Player for Clash this Friday

embed.description: AsteryskRain / Platinum 5 76LP / 76W 53L Win Ratio 59% / Trundle - 21W 9L Win Ratio 70%, Olaf - 9W 3L Win Ratio 75%, Graves - 8W 4L Win Ratio 67%, Cassiopeia - 5W 4L Win Ratio 56%, Ryze - 2W 6L Win Ratio 25%

body:
We're looking for one strong player around gold to platinum rank (will take into account winrates and recent performances)

Requirements:
- Working mic (with Discord working)
- Past experience in a 5's environment/online tournament setting
- The ability to supply your own clash ticket + Honour 2 (To participate in Clash)

Currently have 4 players on the roster that are flexible with their roles, so Top, ADC and Support roles are still open.

The players on the team have won the Summoner Society solo/duo open tournament (against masters and challengers) and we're looking for a fifth player to complement the roster as one of our players are away for the weekend.

Send me a friend request (AsteryskRain) or respond to this thread, and I'll get back to you ASAP.

replies.body: Yeah I'm keen - threw you an add on my main
Hey mate g5 support main have been to g1 supporting. I main morgana and Nami so throw us an invite if you are still keen.

I would like to join your Clash Team. Was silver in s6 but reached diamond in s7. I'm flexible to play sup and top but primarily play top. http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=NEWMY%20REFORMED
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=MrSwagDTagsYolo
Sent you a friend request ingame

im a D4 sup main, if theres a spot open add me plz 
name: JOKAR
Bump - Still looking for more players to trial
